divs: Sighting DetailsI was at home and walked outside to smoke a cigarette, because my mom does not want me smoking in the house. I looked up at the sky to see if it was a clear sky. I saw some stars in the sky and they looked faded because of the lights that come from downtown Chicago. All of a sudden I saw a very bright light in the sky that looked like a star. It was moving very slow in the sky for about 10 seconds before it faded away. My sighting started at 4:26 AM
trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were no other sightings in Chicago on or around July 30th 2006
